title: Edwards & Petersen Now Offering Free Debt Relief Consultation!
text:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
July 9th, 2015
For more information, contact:
Edwards & Petersen, PLC
2345 S Alma School Rd, #204
Mesa, AZ 85210
(480) 779-8377
http://edwardspetersen.com/
Mesa, Arizona - (July 9th, 2015) ­– Is your debt piling high and there's no relief in sight? If so, it may be time to consider filing for bankruptcy and putting an end to the harassing phone calls from debt collectors. When you're ready for financial help, you should call Edwards & Petersen. Edwards & Petersen is a law firm located in Mesa, Arizona that deals with bankruptcy, debt collection relief, criminal law, family law, DUI cases and more. They have affordable rates and optional payment plans. They are also one of the only offices in town that has an available attorney on-hand, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Edwards & Petersen also has very flexible appointment times so they can be sure to match your schedule. Financial turmoil is often overwhelming and seeking legal counsel that understands your situation, and who can help explain your options in simple terms, will help to alleviate some of the stress you are feeling. They now even offer free bankruptcy consultation and free debt collection relief consultation. For bankruptcy consultations, they can help you understand the different kinds of bankruptcy options available and if this is the best route for you. For debt collection, they can establish what kind of behavior the collection agencies are exhibiting and if they are trying to collect your debt in an illegal manner. They also help people avoid bankruptcy with strategies that protect your rights and help to equip you with the knowledge needed to give you an advantage in dealing with your creditors. Bankruptcy relief may be the only resolution to your financial difficulties. Their attorneys can help you understand your options, file bankruptcy notices, negotiate with creditors, and explain how and if, the law allows you to safeguard assets while in repayment.
